item.title: Trump deploying National Guard to L.A. as protests ramp up after ICE operations
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom called the move "purposefully inflammatory" and one that "will only escalate tensions."

item.title: 6/7: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Protests, outrage over ICE raids in Southern California; Iconic Goodyear Blimp takes to the skies for 100 years of flights.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (June 8)
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: What to know about the L.A. immigration protests after ICE operations
item.description: President Trump ordered that at least 2,000 National Guard troops would be deployed to L.A. "for 60 days or at the discretion of the Secretary of Defe...

item.title: Colombian senator and presidential hopeful shot in assassination attempt
item.description: Miguel Uribe Turbay is the son of a journalist who was kidnapped and killed in 1991 during one of the country's most violent periods.
